sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Wal-Mart Stores ( WMT ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.7%.
Year to date, Wal-Mart Stores has lost about 30.0% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Chevron ( CVX ), trading down 2.6%.
Chevron is lower by about 22.1% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Caterpillar ( CAT ), trading down 2.0%, and Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading up 0.6% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
